sentences.english: Heavy wood with dark colored heartwood used for ornaments.
sentences.chinese: 重硬且心材呈濃色者可供作木藝品製造用。

sentences.english: Up-take of sapwood was obviously higher than that of heartwood.
sentences.chinese: 邊材上染率明顯高於心材。

sentences.english: What can be said about the range of dates of the last heartwood rings?
sentences.chinese: 怎樣描述最後的心材環的日期範圍。

sentences.english: The heartwood yields a red dye. Seed can be used for oil extraction.
sentences.chinese: 其心材可生產一種紅色的顏料，種子可用來榨油。

sentences.english: Rough redwood or construction grade heartwood lumber are the preferred choices for wall construction.
sentences.chinese: 粗糙紅木或建築系心材是修建隔離牆的優先選擇。

sentences.english: One or more layers of living and functional sapwood cells are periodically converted to heartwood.
sentences.chinese: 每個生長週期都有一或多層活的邊材細胞轉變成心材。

sentences.english: Conclusion Gentiopicrin are chiefly concentrated on the parts of the heart-wooded.
sentences.chinese: 結論秦艽龍膽苦苷主要集中在根心材部分。

sentences.english: The black heartwood has uneven red- brown stripes or a marbled effect.
sentences.chinese: 黑色心材上有錯落的紅棕色條紋或大理石紋理。

definition: sapwood (between vascular cambium and pith inside growing wood)
pomelo tree (Citrus maxima or C. grandis)/shaddock/oriental grapefruit
